Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Toscano Textiles

A renovated clothing shop. You are in the front room. It is fairly small with a simple table and bench sitting on on the eastern side of the room. A male mannequin, female dress form, and a clothing rack are standing near the western wall, alongside a full-length mirror. Two exits are located in this store front: an open doorway dividing this room with another room north of here, and a small oak door on the south leading back to the eastern side of the common area. A long, black walnut counter is standing parallel from the open doorway. There are two large, clean windows on either side of the oak door gently lit by the morning sun.brightly lit by the afternoon sun.dimly lit by the fading sun. barely lit by the moonlight.

A renovated clothing shop gently lit by the morning sun.brightly lit by the afternoon sun.dimly lit by the fading sun. barely lit by the moonlight. You are in the front room. It is fairly small with a simple table and bench sitting on on the eastern side of the room. A male mannequin, female dress form, and a clothing rack are standing near the western wall, alongside a full-length mirror.

A renovated clothing shop gently lit by the morning sun.brightly lit by the afternoon sun.dimly lit by the fading sun. barely lit by the moonlight. You are in the front room. It is fairly small with a simple table and bench sitting on on the eastern side of the room. A male mannequin, female dress form, and a clothing rack are standing near the western wall, alongside a full-length mirror.
an open doorway
An empty, black walnut door frame leads to the north room. It currently has no covering. $(parent-desc)
An empty, black walnut door frame leads to the north. $(parent-desc)
a small oak door leading southwest
A small oak door set into the west side of the southern wall. $(parent-desc)

The close-studded, timbered western wall is constructed of dark, black walnut posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, all perfectly flat and square. Most of the studs are of the same width, though some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly 'inward' as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of black walnut, securely nailed into place. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden framing. The wall is about eight feet high.

The close-studded, timbered western wall is constructed of dark, black walnut posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, all perfectly flat and square. Most of the studs are of the same width, though some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of black walnut, securely nailed into place.
The half-timbered western wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of black walnut.
The half-timbered western wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of black walnut
the black walnut ceiling
The ceiling is made from smooth black walnut planks, of various widths. The planks are evenly laid.
The even ceiling of a dark room is made from smooth black planks, of various widths.
The ceiling of the dim room is made from smooth black planks, of various widths. The floor is evenly laid.
The ceiling is made from smooth black walnut, of various widths. The planks are shiny, new, and evenly placed.
The ceiling is made from smooth black planks, of various widths. The planks are evenly laid.
The ceiling is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The ceiling is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
the timeworn dark walnut counter

A long, timeworn dark walnut counter. This is a waist high piece of furniture used to partially divide the front room of the Clothiers Shop. The black walnut construct is nicked and timeworn from frequent use.
the black walnut floor
The floor is made from smooth black walnut planks, of various widths. The planks are evenly laid.
The even floor of a dark room is made from smooth black planks, of various widths.
The floor of the dim room is made from smooth black planks, of various widths. The floor is evenly laid.
The floor is made from smooth black walnut, of various widths. The planks are shiny, new, and evenly placed.
The floor is made from smooth black planks, of various widths. The planks are evenly laid.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
narrow, full-length mirror
An unremarkable and narrow, full-length mirror. It is undecorated and features rough, unsanded edges. A partially blurry image of yourself is displayed within the hand mirror:
A narrow, full-length mirror. The edging is rough and undecorated. A vague image of yourself is displayed within the hand mirror:

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of black walnut posts and diagonal braces, perfectly flat and square -- most are of the same width, though some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of clean, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of black walnut posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, all perfectly flat and square. The studs are of the same width, though some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly 'inward' as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of clean, whitewashed plaster, laid over laths or wattle-work covered with clay mixed with horse-hair. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden framing. The wall is about eight feet high.

the northern wall

The close-studded, half-timbered northern wall of this dim room is constructed of black walnut posts and diagonal braces, perfectly flat and square -- most are of the same width, though some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of clean, white plaster. An open doorway has been centrally built, leading into the work room.

The timbered northern wall of this dim room is constructed of black walnut posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of black walnut. Two large, clean windows, which let in the morning morning sunlightmoonlight, are on opposite sides of the open doorway.
the southern wall
